## GraphNode interface

Represents a node in the graph view.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface GraphNode
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

Type of the node, can be of value `"tag"`<!-- -->, `"unresolved"`<!-- -->, `"attachment"`<!-- -->, or an empty string for markdown nodes.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[weight](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.weight.md)

</td><td>

</td><td>

number

</td><td>

Weight of the node depending on the number of related nodes (forwards and backward).

</td></tr>

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[clearGraphics()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.cleargraphics.md)

</td><td>

Destroy the graphics and its children, and remove them from the scene.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getDisplayText()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.getdisplaytext.md)

</td><td>

Get the displayed text associated to the node.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getFillColor()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.getfillcolor.md)

</td><td>

Get the current fill color.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getRelated()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.getrelated.md)

</td><td>

Get the ids of connected nodes (back and forward links).

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getSize()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.getsize.md)

</td><td>

Get the current size of the node, after weight and node size multiplier have been applied.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getTextStyle()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.gettextstyle.md)

</td><td>

Get the text style of the node.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[initGraphics()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.initgraphics.md)

</td><td>

Initialize the node, text, listeners, and add them to the scene.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onClick(e)](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.onclick.md)

</td><td>

Method called when the node (circle) is clicked, trigger the context menu if it's a right click

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[render()](./obsidian-typings.graphnode.render.md)

</td><td>

Render the node.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
